summary: A group of four teenage girls come of age in the asphalt desert of Los Angeles' San Fernando Valley arranged with a blazing soundtrack and endless drinking, drugs and sex.
cast: Jodie Foster|Cherie Currie|Marilyn Kagan|Kandice Stroh|Scott Baio|Sally Kellerman|Randy Quaid|Lois Smith|Adam Faith|Sloan Roberts|Jill Barrie Bogart|Wayne Storm|Mary Margaret Lewis|Grant Wilson|Fredric Lehne|Robert Romanus|Roger Bowen|Buddy Foster|E. Lamont Johnson|Mary Ellen O'Neill|Ben Frank|Kay Tornborg|Scott Garrett|Laura Dern|Michael Taylor|Gino Baffa|Charles Shull|Tony Termini|Jeff Silverman|Mae Williams|R. Scott Thomson|Steve Craig|Ron Lombard|Steve Jones|Jon M. Benson|Tom Pletts|Ken Novick|Frank DiMino|Gregg Giuffria|Punky Meadows|Felix Robinson|Christopher Gaw|Mo Kelly|Johnny Luckett|Bradley Sackin|Veronica J. Valentini
title: Zorras
